content: crocheted hearts appliqued on a patchwork quilt blue heart and striped heart sew the hearts on the front of the quilt filling them lightly with polyester wadding or cotton to give them volume 47 x 28 dmc cébélia size 10 284yrds/260m 1 75oz/50g 2 balls of cebelia art 167ga 1 ball of cebelia art 167g colors blue and white approximately 79 x 59 wide-striped blue and white cotton approximately 79 x 59 of narrow-striped blue and white cotton approximately 59 x 47 of dotted cotton approximately 59 x 59 of stuffing of your choice
